scripts.claudia-create-get: claudia create --region us-east-1 --handler index.handler --name getMailbox --source ./server/getMailbox --profile personal
scripts.claudia-update-get: claudia update --region us-east-1 --handler index.handler --name getMailbox --source ./server/getMailbox --profile personal
scripts.claudia-create-post: claudia create --region us-east-1 --handler index.handler --name createMailbox --source ./server/createMailbox --profile personal
scripts.claudia-update-post: claudia update --region us-east-1 --handler index.handler --name createMailbox --source ./server/createMailbox --profile personal
